amendment.description: Amendment deletes section 8057 which prohibits funds in the bill from being used to approve or license the sale of the F/A-22 advanced tactical fighter to any foreign government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 8057 (relating to the sale of the F/A-22 advanced tactical fighter to foreign governments).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Granger amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
